---
title: CDP Integrations
description: 'Start building loyal communities with targeted, gated offers.'
icon: 'bolt-lightning'
---

The data collected from datacapture will be synced to your dashboard, where you can download the data in CSV format.
gocertify also supports a direct integration with the following platforms, enabling you to real-time sync data to your CDP/CRM and action is straight away.


<CardGroup cols={2}>
  <Card title="Klayviyo" href="/documentationSections/2_captureData/klayviyo" img="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTwaP9R3gCjkCAjHZCi5qx-hnu9cdFZCV4nPQ&s">
    Grow faster and more efficiently with email, sms, reviews and more. Powered by your customer data.
  </Card>
  <Card title="Dot Digital" href="/documentationSections/2_captureData/dotdigital" img="data:image/png;base64,">
    Dotdigital's all-in-one platform unifies customer data to power your campaigns
  </Card>
  <Card title="Emarsys" href="/documentationSections/2_captureData/emarsys" img="https://internetretailing.net/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/em-logo-dark_Main.png">
    Personalize every customer interaction with Emarsys' predictive and generative AI.
  </Card>
  <Card title="Ometria" href="/documentationSections/2_captureData/ometria" img="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/59b83f13ddad6600013d0307/628be699bb2b50a9db41164e_ometria-logo.jpg">
    Use real-time customer data to drive better insight & on-point personalization
  </Card>
  <Card title="Bloomreach" href="/documentationSections/2_captureData/bloomreach" img="https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/327274/bloomreach_logo.jpg?p=facebook">
     Personalise the ecommerce experience. Use real-time data and AI to connect every customer with what they want to see
  </Card>
</CardGroup>
